title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 17, 2026 8:00 AM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel Report — Tuesday, Feb 17, 2026 @ 8:00 AM ET

**Top Headlines: Futures slide on AI disruption fears ahead of shortened week | BTC drops to $68K as crypto-Nasdaq correlation turns positive | Walmart/DoorDash/eBay earnings week kicks off | Melius downgrades MSFT to Hold | Intesa Sanpaolo discloses $100M BTC ETF holdings**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Futures falling** — Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures all red ahead of shortened week (Presidents' Day). AI disruption fears weighing on sentiment. *(Yahoo Finance)*
- **Bitcoin slides to $68,000** — Tech-led risk-off move deepens. BTC-Nasdaq correlation turning positive means crypto moving in lockstep with tech selloff. Memecoins leading altcoin losses. *(CoinDesk)*
- **Earnings week** — Walmart (WMT), DoorDash (DASH), eBay (EBAY) headline this week's reports. *(Yahoo Finance)*
- **Leidos (LDOS) misses revenue** — Government shutdown impact cited for quarterly miss. *(Reuters)*
- **Microsoft downgraded** — Melius Research cuts MSFT to Hold. TD Cowen lowers price target on Intuit (INTU). *(Yahoo Finance)*

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **Futures red** — S&P 500 / Nasdaq / Dow futures all declining pre-market on AI disruption concerns
- **MSFT** — Downgraded to Hold by Melius Research
- **INTU** — Price target lowered by TD Cowen
- **LDOS** — Missed revenue estimates, government shutdown headwinds
- **WMT** — Earnings this week, in focus
- **AMZN** — Listed among top cloud computing stocks to buy (Insider Monkey)
- **Year's top 5 stocks** already have big runs per Investor's Business Daily (SNDK mentioned)

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC ~$68,000** — Under pressure even as panic ebbs. Lack of demand in derivatives + ETF flows. *(CoinDesk)*
- **Crypto slides alongside tech stocks** — BTC-Nasdaq positive correlation means crypto tracking equity risk-off. Gold also retreating. *(CoinDesk)*
- **Intesa Sanpaolo** — Italian banking giant discloses $100M in BTC ETF holdings plus Strategy (MSTR) put hedge. *(CoinDesk)*
- **Steak 'n Shake** — Reports BTC payments boosted sales "dramatically," directing BTC to Strategic Bitcoin Reserve for employee bonuses. *(CoinDesk)*
- **Bitcoin spam debate** — BIP to block spam drawing heat from heavyweights in the community. *(CoinDesk)*
- **DeFi protocol ZeroLend shuts down** — After 3 years, citing unsustainable economics and hacks. *(CoinDesk)*
- **UK crypto regulation** — Rules "too slow" to support global hub ambitions per Agant CEO. *(CoinDesk)*

---

## 🔵 Bloomberg

- Bloomberg blocked by bot detection — unable to scrape headlines this run
- Key context: Markets in risk-off mode, AI sector under pressure, shortened trading week

---

| 457 | What your Bluetooth devices reveal (privacy/security) | 169 |
| 316 | Rise of the Triforce | 43 |
| 295 | Visual introduction to PyTorch (AI/ML) | 21 |
| 280 | GrapheneOS — Break Free from Google and Apple | 191 |

**Notable:** AGENTS.md evaluation paper trending (#159, 114 comments) — directly relevant to AI coding agents. PyTorch visual intro and voice AI alternatives also trending in AI/dev space.

---

## 🐦 X/Twitter Sentiment

- Unable to search X directly (no Brave API key). Based on cross-source signals:
- **AI disruption fears** dominating FinTwit ahead of shortened week
- **$BTC drop to $68K** likely generating bearish sentiment
- **Earnings anticipation** for WMT, DASH, EBAY
- **MSFT downgrade** likely trending among tech watchers

---

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

- **WSB Daily Discussion Thread** live with 630+ comments as of 8 AM — high engagement for a holiday-shortened week
- Reddit API rate-limiting prevented detailed scrape. Based on broader signals:
- Market is closed today (Presidents' Day) but futures active
- AI disruption narrative likely dominating discussion
- BTC weakness at $68K a talking point

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major Tesla/SpaceX headlines in today's scan
- TSLA likely tracking broader tech weakness in futures

---

## 💻 AI & Tech

- **AI disruption fears** — Major theme weighing on Nasdaq futures. Investors reassessing AI valuations. *(Yahoo Finance)*
- **MSFT downgraded** — Melius Research cuts to Hold, potentially AI capex concerns
- **Evaluating AGENTS.md** — Academic paper trending on HN evaluating whether agent config files help coding agents *(arxiv)*
- **Free voice AI tools** — Open-source alternative to Wispr Flow/Superwhisper trending on HN
- **Visual PyTorch intro** — Popular educational content on HN (295 points)
- **Bluetooth privacy concerns** — Deep dive into what BT devices reveal trending (457 pts on HN)

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **Presidents' Day** — Light sports day
- **NBA Thursday Preview:** HOU @ CHA (HOU -2.5, O/U 213.5), BKN @ CLE (CLE -14.5, O/U 228.5), ATL @ PHI
- **Key matchups:** KD (25.8 PPG) vs LaMelo Ball (19.3 PPG), Donovan Mitchell (29.0 PPG) vs Nets
- **College Basketball:** #6 Iowa State beat Houston — Nate Heise go-ahead 3 *(ESPN)*
- **Winter Olympics** coverage building for Milan-Cortina 2026 *(ESPN)*

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Gold retreating** alongside crypto and tech — broad risk-off move *(CoinDesk)*
- **Markets closed today** for Presidents' Day — shortened trading week ahead
- **Government shutdown impact** — already hitting defense/gov contractors like Leidos
- **AI capex concerns** — driving macro rotation out of tech growth names

---

*Report generated: Feb 17, 2026 8:00 AM ET | Sources: Yahoo Finance, CoinDesk, Hacker News API, ESPN, Reddit (partial) | Note: Brave Search API key missing — web_search unavailable. Bloomberg blocked. Reddit rate-limited. Reduced source coverage this run.*
